verses.verse: Open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy doors <S%H1817><s%>, O Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, that the fire <S%H784><s%> may devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy cedars <S%H730><s%>.

Howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, fir tree <S%H1265><s%>; for the cedar <S%H730><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; because the mighty <S%H117><s%> are spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O ye oaks <S%H437><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>; for the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the vintage <S%H1208><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> is come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

There is a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the howling <S%H3215><s%> of the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; for their glory <S%H155><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the roaring <S%H7581><s%> of young lions <S%H3715><s%>; for the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; Feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of the slaughter <S%H2028><s%>;

Whose possessors <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8802><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and hold themselves not guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and they that sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for I am rich <S%H6238><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: and their own shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> pity <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them not.

For I will no more pity <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but, lo, I will deliver <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> into his neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his king <S%H4428><s%>: and they shall smite <S%H3807><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and out of their hand <S%H3027><s%> I will not deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them.

And I will feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of slaughter <S%H2028><s%>, even you <S%H3651><s%>, O poor <S%H6041><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%>. And I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me two <S%H8147><s%> staves <S%H4731><s%>; the one <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Beauty <S%H5278><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Bands <S%H2254><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; and I fed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%>.

Three <S%H7969><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> also I cut off <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> month <S%H3391><s%>; and my soul <S%H5315><s%> lothed <S%H7114><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and their soul <S%H5315><s%> also abhorred <S%H973><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, I will not feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you: that that dieth <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, let it die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and that that is to be cut off <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, let it be cut off <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and let the rest <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every one <S%H802><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of another <S%H7468><s%>.

And I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my staff <S%H4731><s%>, even Beauty <S%H5278><s%>, and cut it asunder <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that I might break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I had made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with all the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And it was broken <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8714><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>: and so the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> that waited <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon me knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, If ye think <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>, give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me my price <S%H7939><s%>; and if not, forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8798><s%>. So they weighed <S%H8254><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for my price <S%H7939><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8685><s%> it unto the potter <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: a goodly <S%H145><s%> price <S%H3366><s%> that I was prised at <S%H3365><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of them. And I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them to the potter <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Then I cut asunder <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8799><s%> mine other <S%H8145><s%> staff <S%H4731><s%>, even Bands <S%H2254><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that I might break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the brotherhood <S%H264><s%> between Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto thee yet the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of a foolish <S%H196><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

For, lo, I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8688><s%> a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, which shall not visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> those that be cut off <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, neither shall seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the young one <S%H5289><s%>, nor heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that that is broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, nor feed <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8770><s%> that that standeth <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> still: but he shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the fat <S%H1277><s%>, and tear <S%H6561><s%> their cTorahs <S%H6541><s%> in pieces <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the idol <S%H457><s%> shepherd <S%H7473><s%> that leaveth <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> ! the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be upon his arm <S%H2220><s%>, and upon his right <S%H3225><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%>: his arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be clean <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8800><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his right <S%H3225><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be utterly <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8800><s%> darkened <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
